> <OLD>
>
> "check your weapons" hissed the male while he review his weapon"We might
> have a trouble or two"

JHIAXUS nodded, "yes, considering that this ship is Unicronian and
those mechs out there are Autobot I would think so." His tone was
somewhat sarcastic and yet there was a grim determination in it as
well.

Suddenly the ship was rocked with laser fire, explosions all around them!

"Look!" SCORPONOK said as he pointed at the screen

http://www.karridian.net/robotech_sc_veritechs.html

On the screen it showed not the Aerialbots but several hover tanks
firing on their shuttle as well as the Aerialbots!

The AERIALBOTS quickly moved off rather than returned fire.

"That is strange." SCORPONOK said thoughtfully. "Why did the
Aerialbots move away rather than fight?"

JHIAXUS shrugged as he opened fire on the tanks, "We can see about the
later, first we have a few enemies to dispose of!"

Something seemed wrong here.

(TAG)

- Preston
